#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<vector>
#include<memory.h>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<cassert>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;


vector<string>word;

int N;
string K;
string ans;

bool cmp(string x, string y)
{
    return x+y>y+x;
}

void solve()
{
    ans = "";
    word.clear();
    scanf("%d", &N);
    while(N--)
    {
    cin>>K;
    word.push_back(K);
    }
    sort(word.begin(), word.end(), cmp);
    for(int i=0; i<word.size(); i++)
    {
        ans.append(word[i]);
    }

    cout<<ans<<endl;
}

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif

    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
        solve();
    }
}
